'''Enter the "border"''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during {{Quest|The Funeral Parlor Has No Master, Yujing Terrace Calls the Troops}}.

==Walkthrough==
# Go deeper into the domain
#Dispel the Fetor Node on the mechanism
# Activate the door mechanism
#Defeat enemies: {{Enemy List|Hilichurl*3;Blazing Axe Mitachurl}}
#Activate the door mechanism
#*Common Chest
#Drop down into the hole
# Go deeper into the domain
#Dispel the Fetor Nodes and catch the rattan figures (0/3)
#*Western node 
#**Defeat enemies: {{Enemy List|Hilichurl*2}}
#*Northern node
#*Southern node
#Drop down into the hole
#* Precious Chest
#Defend the portal:
#*Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Hilichurl Shooter*2;Hilichurl Fighter*2;Blazing Axe Mitachurl}}
#*Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Blazing Axe Mitachurl;Crackling Axe Mitachurl}}
#*Wave 3: {{Enemy List|Cryo Hilichurl Shooter*2;Hilichurl Berserker*2}}

==Chests==
*Common Chest &times; 1
*Precious Chest &times; 1

==Gameplay Notes==
*Fetor Nodes can only be attacked while Xiao's ability is active.
* During step 8, the Southern node will only become available after both the Northern and Western nodes are dispelled. The latter two can be done in any order.
*During step 10, the portal's HP cannot reach 0% for 60s. Defeating the enemies is not a requirement.
